thread.title: Celebrities Read Mean Tweets About Themselves in Honor of the Oscars
thread.title_full: Celebrities Read Mean Tweets About Themselves in Honor of the Oscars

author: Gina Mei
title: Celebrities Read Mean Tweets About Themselves in Honor of the Oscars
text:
Celebrities Read Mean Tweets About Themselves in Honor of the Oscars 
Some of these are SAVAGE. Twitter ABC Feb 27, 2017 Jimmy Kimmel just brought one of the most popular segments from his show to the Oscars. Smack dab in the middle of the Academy Awards on Sunday night, the host debuted a very special edition of Mean Tweets, featuring Oscar attendees past and present reading some very savage tweets about themselves. In my personal opinion, this tweet about Miles Teller is probably the most clever of the bunch. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below But Emma Stone probably wins for most charming reaction. You can watch the whole thing below: Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Natalie Portman and more star in Mean Tweets: #Oscars edition. pic.twitter.com/5NHHvxuT3D â€” Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 Follow Gina on Twitter .
